name: Descent Into Madness (Aeshe, Josh Simpson, Dragons0, Leebleh, lewisZALTY, christoms98)
name_original: Descent Into Madness (Aeshe, Josh Simpson, Dragons0, Leebleh, lewisZALTY, christoms98)
description:
Descent Into Madness is a short, University project that was made in the span of four weeks. The idea behind it is that the more you die, the more insane you become.

Deaths result in a small damage increase however the player will be plagued by noises, dimming lights and phantom enemies.

*THIS IS ONLY A PROTOTYPE*
